ACTIVITY LISTS DUE

“Myskania requests that all juniors
make a complete list of their activities
and ofﬁces since they have been in
College," Ruth Lane, ’28, president of
the student association, said 10-day.
“These lists must be handed to some
member of Myskania today."

FOR WEEK OF MAY 6
